sentences.en: A half million people watched the troops march in New York's ticker tape parade.
sentences.cn: 有50万人观看了部队在纽约纸带纷飞的欢迎仪式中列队前进。

sentences.en: a military parade
sentences.cn: 军事检阅

sentences.en: a military paradee
sentences.cn: 军事检阅

sentences.en: a victory parade
sentences.cn: 胜利游行

sentences.en: A witness picked him out of an identification parade as the robber.
sentences.cn: 一名目击者将他从辨认队列中指认出来,说他就是抢匪.

sentences.en: Drugs again rained on the Olympics'parade as another athlete tested positive for an illegal substance.
sentences.cn: 兴奋剂再次煞了奥运会的风景,又有一名运动员的违禁药物检测结果呈阳性.

sentences.en: He had them on parade at six o'clock in the morning.
sentences.cn: 他让他们早晨6点列队接受检阅。

sentences.en: He is not one to parade his achievements.
sentences.cn: 他不是一个爱炫耀自己成就的人。

sentences.en: He made his entrance into the parade ring.
sentences.cn: 他走向赛马准备区。

sentences.en: I love to put on a bathing suit and parade on the beach.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢穿着泳衣在海滩上招摇而行。

sentences.en: More than four thousand soldiers, sailors, and airmen paraded down the Champs Elysees.
sentences.cn: 超过四千名士兵、水手和飞行员沿着香榭丽舍大街游行。

sentences.en: She is on parade in her new dress in the street.
sentences.cn: 她穿着新衣服在大街上走来走去.

sentences.en: Suede are once again riding high in the hit parade with their new single.
sentences.cn: 山羊皮乐队凭新单曲又一次登上了畅销歌曲排行榜的前列。

sentences.en: The boys loved watching the soldiers on parade.
sentences.cn: 男孩子们爱看士兵们列队行进.

sentences.en: The Chancellor will be able to parade his cut in interest rates as a small victory.
sentences.cn: 财政大臣就能把他的减息举措当作一场小胜来夸耀了。

sentences.en: The man made a parade of his own wealth in public.
sentences.cn: 那人公开炫耀自己的财富.

sentences.en: The marchers paraded peacefully through the capital.
sentences.cn: 游行队伍有秩序地列队穿过首都。

sentences.en: The marshal rode at the head of the parade.
sentences.cn: 典礼官在检阅队伍的前面骑马行进.

sentences.en: The Olympic Games began with a parade of all the competing nations.
sentences.cn: 奥运会以所有参赛国列队进场开始.

sentences.en: the St Patrick’s Day parade
sentences.cn: 圣帕特里克节庆祝游行

sentences.en: We belted down Iveagh Parade to where the motor was.
sentences.cn: 我们沿着艾维格大街一路飞奔到汽车那儿。

sentences.en: Women were not supposed to parade their ambition nakedly.
sentences.cn: 女性被认为不应该赤裸裸地展示其雄心。

sentences.en: Young athletes will get a chance to parade their skills.
sentences.cn: 年轻运动员将有机会一展身手。

phrases.tran_cn: [美国英语]学时髦；跟着大众行动

trans.tran_en: a public celebration when musical bands, brightly decorated vehicles etc move down the street

trans.tran_cn: 游行,夸耀n.检阅,阅兵式v.使列队行进
trans.tran_en: a public celebration when musical bands, brightly decorated vehicles etc move down the street

trans.tran_cn: 游行，展览，招摇过市，接受检阅
trans.tran_en: to walk or march together to celebrate or protest about something
to walk or march together to celebrate or protest about something
